channel.title: Paradise 317 [Allstar]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hello, My Name is Dokan, This is the progress thread for the Allstar server I am making with my friend. The Initial Base I used was awful, The Shops Had Many Nulled items, disorganized Code, and many other problems. I fixed most of that up, and now am beginning to move onto actual content for the server. Here I will Keep some progress on what I've done, and What I plan to do.[/size] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0001_zpsa5d67f47.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0000_zpsa0cdc59f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0003_zpsbdb3ccc9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0004_zps530e316c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0005_zpsfb3c971a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0006_zps224f3e87.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0007_zps4eafc8a3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0008_zps7778bbb5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0009_zps25dab495.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0010_zpsa02832aa.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0011_zpsc6e7d0cb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0012_zpsa1c3967e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0013_zpsaf64c378.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0014_zps4711eabe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0015_zps17098348.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0016_zpsbd3407f7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0017_zps628a27b2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0018_zps917a9f3b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0019_zpse733dd2f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0020_zps4249175c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0021_zpsbae5f631.png[/img] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- What Is Done: *All areas that need to be nonwild are now nonwild. *All nulls in shops fixed, made certain testing items untradable. *Customs have animations, and prices. *Many items would wield as a weapon, removed and fixed many glitched customs/items. *Reorganized client.java to have better grammar, and made the client much cleaner. *Made the exp balance out to a level max of 200. *Made certain items require over 100 of a stat. *Added a member zone, and pkrewards. *Got funpk to work. (I'm pretty sure.) *Relocated and cleaned many shops, and npcs that were randomly spawned. *Fixed the Kbd area. *Fixed the Kalphite Queen Area. *Fixed Item Stats. *Slayer level requirements for certain monsters, like dark beast, kbd, and abyysal demons. *Added A Gamble command costing 200m, for chance at good items. *Added Exp lamps, giving 500m each, should be enough to max a skill, or get close to max. *Fixed Mage Level Requirements, and exp for such. *Fixed high alch prices. *Fixed blood rune lag. *Fixed Npc Health resetting itself. *Removed some customs from member shop to add into the economy, through a new monster/minigame I may add. I hope I can begin working on expanding content since lots of the annoyances are out of the way, sorry for the disorganization of the pictures, I don't have alot of time to work on my server now days.

item.title: Paradise 317 [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:15, topic:477608”][quote author=Dokan42 link=topic=595803.msg4195414#msg4195414 date=1357429608]
From what I know, a null is a item that does not have a rendered model from my experience. Sorry If i sound stupid in my initial post, this is my first development.
[/quote]
well you’re completely off, but you don’t sound stupid at all. More like well spoken and this project looks as if its coming along well.[/quote]

They’re off in terms of the Java Language, but not completely off in regards to R.S.P.S. Props for giving a proper response.

  • Respect for “Clawz fury”

Read full topic

item.title: Paradise 317 [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @Dokan42 Dokan42
item.description:
@Dokan42 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Protip to everyone creating these ‘Fun Servers’: Make a Leveling System that’s interactive. Nobody likes to kill N.P.C. that are just grouped together.

I will add other ways to train in the future, Im focusing on more content to get some new items put into the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Paradise 317 [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @Dokan42 Dokan42
item.description:
@Dokan42 wrote:

[quote=“OGolemX, post:4, topic:477608”]i think its good but you shoul make it more liek your own server, when i look at it i just see exactly the same as stabbing scape, i like your ideas and i love allstar, maybe i could help you out a bit…
btw how do you get stabbingscape source i would love to download it and remake it better. in my own version, but every link i found for stabbingscape was shut down…
if you need some coding help or if you need another coder, i might be willing to help.
-OGolemX.

(Owner Of GolemXScape 317 AllStar)[/quote]
I’ve just finished fixing everything wrong with the source, I just added a member zone, and a gamble command today, I’ll send you the link to the base I used. (DON’T USE IT, ITS AWFUL, TOOK ME 3 WEEKS TO CLEAN, LOL) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=388971.0 Thats thread with working links.

Read full topic

item.title: Paradise 317 [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @Dokan42 Dokan42
item.description:
@Dokan42 wrote:

[size=14pt]Hello, My Name is Dokan, This is the progress thread for the Allstar server I am making with my friend. The Initial Base I used was awful, The Shops Had Many Nulled items, disorganized Code, and many other problems. I fixed most of that up, and now am beginning to move onto actual content for the server. Here I will Keep some progress on what I’ve done, and What I plan to do.[/size]

What Is Done:
*All areas that need to be nonwild are now nonwild.
*All nulls in shops fixed, made certain testing items untradable.
*Customs have animations, and prices.
*Many items would wield as a weapon, removed and fixed many glitched customs/items.
*Reorganized client.java to have better grammar, and made the client much cleaner.
*Made the exp balance out to a level max of 200.
*Made certain items require over 100 of a stat.
*Added a member zone, and pkrewards.
*Got funpk to work. (I’m pretty sure.)
*Relocated and cleaned many shops, and npcs that were randomly spawned.
*Fixed the Kbd area.
*Fixed the Kalphite Queen Area.
*Fixed Item Stats.
*Slayer level requirements for certain monsters, like dark beast, kbd, and abyysal demons.
*Added A Gamble command costing 200m, for chance at good items.
*Added Exp lamps, giving 500m each, should be enough to max a skill, or get close to max.
*Fixed Mage Level Requirements, and exp for such.
*Fixed high alch prices.
*Fixed blood rune lag.
*Fixed Npc Health resetting itself.
*Removed some customs from member shop to add into the economy, through a new monster/minigame I may add.
I hope I can begin working on expanding content since lots of the annoyances are out of the way, sorry for the disorganization of the pictures, I don’t have alot of time to work on my server now days.

Read full topic
